• VXLIB Function Reference
Pixel-wise Multiplication

OpenVX Function Description

  • Performs element-wise multiplication between two images and a scalar value.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d7/dae/group__group__vision__function__mult.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_multiply_i8u_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_multiply_i8u_i8u_o16s : Input images are U8 format and output image is S16 format
  • VXLIB_multiply_i8u_i16s_o16s : One input image is U8 format, one input image is S16 format and output image is S16 format
  • VXLIB_multiply_i16s_i16s_o16s : Input and output images are S16 format
